title: Interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in a dream for single and divorced women and men

preview.html: Seeing prayer in a dream is one of the most promising and joyful visions, because it reflects signs of the dreamer's closeness to God Almighty, righteousness in his life, and his distance from places of humiliation and sins. Seeing the Maghrib prayer in a dream means a lot of good news, and this is what the site will provide in the following lines of Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman, a divorced woman and a man. Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman, a divorced woman and a man Many interpreters in the interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream for unmarried, divorced and men list many interpretations, most of which symbolize the improvement of the dreamer's condition, facilitating his affairs, achieving his goal and avoiding it. Sins and obscenities. Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream for a single woman Seeing an unmarried woman praying Maghrib in her dream means that something is about to happen that will bring her a lot of good, and also shows the fulfillment of her dreams and aspirations. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream praying Maghrib symbolizes that she is a righteous girl who is very interested in performing her religious duties. If she sees that she performed Maghrib prayer in a dream, this indicates that she is approaching the date of marriage or engagement. If this girl is still searching for knowledge, the meaning of her dream is that she will excel and succeed, God willing. Seeing an unmarried woman performing Maghrib prayer in the mosque is a good vision and good news and evidence of the distinguished position and status that she will achieve in the near future. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about prayer for a single woman in detail by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of Maghrib prayer in a dream about a divorced woman Seeing a divorced woman praying Maghrib in a dream means that her circumstances will change for the better and better. If she sees that her ex-husband orders her to perform the Maghrib prayer and that he prays with her, this is a sign that the water between them will return to its course, and their conditions will be corrected together, and that they will live a stable life together. The vision of the divorced woman If she sees herself in a dream running to perform the Maghrib prayer in her commitment to performing the prayer on time and getting closer to her Creator, the Almighty. Seeing the Maghrib prayer in a dream also symbolizes that she will soon hear good news that pleases her. While if the dreamer sees that she is performing the Maghrib prayer in her dream, this is an indication of the blessing in her life, and the good that will come her way, and that her coming days will bring her a lot of happiness and joy. It also indicates the end of her worries, the end of her distress, and the stability of her life in the future. Interpretation of the Maghrib prayer in a dream for a man The commentators said that seeing the Maghrib prayer in a man’s dream indicates that the dreamer works hard in his job and puts a lot of effort into his work, and this is an indication of an improvement in his financial situation. And if the dreamer sees the sunset at the time of his departure to the Maghrib, this symbolizes the death of a sick relative of his or the death of his relative, and God Almighty knows best. While you see the owner of the dream performing the Maghrib prayer, it is good news that His distress and hardship will go away in the near future, and if he has a debt, this debt will end. He will solve all his problems soon. As if he saw a man performing the obligatory Maghrib prayer in the mosque, this indicates the acceptance of his supplication and obtaining

title: Interpretation of seeing a deceased person in a dream: sick, tired, and complaining

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream Seeing the dead sick in a dream indicates that this dead person was disobedient in his life and that he will be tortured after death, and Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and other great interpreters agreed on this. If you see the deceased complaining of pain in his neck in a dream, this is an indication that this deceased mismanaged his money during his life. If the dead person complains of pain in his hand in a dream, this is evidence that he wronged his brothers in his life and deprived them of their rights. Or that he was earning illegitimate money. If you see the dead complaining If there is pain in the waist or sides, this indicates that he wronged a woman in his life. He did not give her her rights and she could most likely be his wife. If one sees the deceased complaining in a dream of abdominal pain. This is evidence that he wronged his parents and family and that he wronged them. If the dreamer sees the deceased complaining of pain in his eyes while he is asleep. This is strong evidence that the dead person was silent about the truth and observed the forbidden. Interpretation of a dream of a dead person who is sick and crying intensely If one sees a dead person, he knows that he complains of pain Spread all over his body in a dream. This is a sign for the seer to remind him that life is deadly and that he should straighten up his life and adhere to supplication and forgiveness. If the dreamer sees in his vision that the deceased is sick and hungry and asks the dreamer for food in the dream. This is an indication that this dead person needs alms. If the dreamer sees in his vision a dead person crying a lot, this indicates that the dead person needs to pray a lot. If there is someone in the care of God Almighty who has severe pain in his arm. This is evidence that he wronged one of his relatives badly and asks for forgiveness for him. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in the hospital Seeing the deceased patient and staying in the hospital is a vision that indicates that the dreamer may face financial difficulties. And doubling his debts in the coming period. But if a pregnant woman sees a dead person, she knows who the patient is and in the hospital. This indicates that her son is suffering from some health problems. It shows well what she sees. The deceased is sick in the hospital. The owner of the hospital commits some mistakes and taboos in his life. Seeing the deceased patient in the hospital indicates that the visionary will be exposed to some nervous pressure and problems at work in the future The relative. Seeing a deceased patient and staying in the hospital in a dream may indicate that this deceased person is in debt and wants the dreamer to pay off this debt. Seeing the deceased sick and complaining to Ibn Sirin If the dreamer sees a dead person he knows is in pain and suffering from a pain in his head in a dream, this indicates that this dead person was negligent towards his parents. Similarly, the scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the dead sick in a dream. This is an indication that he has a debt owed to God Almighty and wants to pay it off. If the dreamer sees a dead person complaining of pain in his neck, this is evidence of his neglect towards his wife. If the deceased complains of pain in his side in a dream, this is a strong indication that he has wronged his wife severely. Interpretation of seeing the deceased tired and complaining to Ibn Shaheen If anyone sees a dead person in reality that he is sick and crying from the severity of his illness in a dream, this is a sign that he will be tortured in his grave, God forbid.

title: Interpretation of a seal in a dream - Seeing an ink seal in a dream

preview.html: Seal - In a dream, the meaning of the dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of dreams Seal and signature in a dream Dream of seals Seals If you dream of seeing seals, this means that you are burning in a place that you cannot protect. Dreams of seals usually indicate that the dreamer has high ambitions and that dissatisfaction will plunge him into struggles in order to advance his position. A seal of any kind for any kind, interpreted with kindness and elevation, especially for the one who was sealed If it is empty, or by the hand of the jinn, or sealed with it in the ears, or eyes, or mouths, or hearts, this indicates that God Almighty hates those afflicted with such a thing. And if he sees in his hand a seal with which he seals money or produce, and he is entitled to the matter, he pledges it, or if he is poor, he is satisfied. Interpretation of the seal in a dream The Islamic approach has shown that seeing a seal indicates status and position and can indicate money or saving and investing it, and it is generally an indication of the blessings enjoyed by the dreamer. The use of a seal in the dreamer's dream indicates the dreamer's distinction and his desire to leave a good impression on the souls of those around him. Seal in a single dream The seal of an unmarried girl on white papers indicates that she will get a job if she is looking for a job opportunity, and seeing her seal on the passport portends success or success in an important matter in her life. She is busy with herself and therefore seeing the seal in the dream of an unmarried girl is a clear indication of putting a final end to the matter that occupies her mind. Seal in a married dream The interpretation of seeing a seal in a married woman's dream is no different from seeing it in an unmarried woman, except that it can be added that the vision of a married woman of her husband sealing the papers and putting them in her hand is an indication of money or benefit. She gets from her husband and can also refer to the alimony. The seal in a pregnant woman's dream As for seeing the seal in a pregnant woman's dream, scholars and commentators said that it has a strong indication of the end of the pregnancy period and that the pregnant woman is about to enter labor and childbirth. This vision is a message to prepare and prepare to enter this stage, and the seal can herald in a pregnant woman's dream that her newborn will be as she desires, male or female. A seal on a man's dream As for the interpretation of seeing the seal in a man's dream, ancient scholars said that seeing the seal indicates the prestige, pride and authority of the monarch or leadership and authority, especially if the seal is made of metal, either silver or gold, and the seal can be mentioned at the beginning, especially if the ink and the seal printer are clear on the papers. The best dream related to seeing the seal in a person's dream is to see a seal with the word of His Majesty (Allah) or a seal with the name of the most precious creation of our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. Upon him, or the seal in the shape of an eagle, as all of these indicate his elevation and position as a prominent seer in the next period of his life Interpretation of rings in a dream YouTube

And if he sees in his hand a seal with which he seals money or produces, and he is worthy of the order, then he pledges it, or if he is poor, he is satisfied. Interpretation of the seal in a dream. The Islamic approach has shown that seeing a seal indicates status and status and can indicate money or saving and investing it, which is generally An indication of the blessings that the dreamer enjoys. The use of a seal in the dreamer’s dream indicates the dreamer’s distinction and his desire to leave a good impact on the souls of those around him. A seal in one’s dream. An unmarried girl’s seal on white papers indicates that she will get a job if she is looking for a job opportunity, Seeing her stamp on the passport portends success or success in an important matter in her life. She is busy with herself, and therefore seeing a seal in an unmarried girl’s dream is a clear indication of putting a final end to the issue that is troubling her mind. A seal in a married woman’s dream. The interpretation of seeing a seal in a married woman’s dream does not differ from seeing it in an unmarried woman, except that it can be added that seeing a married woman To her husband sealing the papers and placing them in her hand, indicating money or benefit. She gets it from her husband, and she can also return for maintenance. The seal in a pregnant woman’s dream. As for seeing a seal in a pregnant woman’s dream, scholars and commentators have said that it has a strong indication of the end of the pregnancy period and that the pregnant woman is about to enter labor and delivery. This vision is a message of preparation and readiness to enter this Stage, and the seal can herald in a pregnant woman’s dream that her new baby will be like what she desires, whether male or female. Seal on a man’s dream. As for the interpretation of seeing a seal in a man’s dream, ancient scholars said that seeing a seal indicates prestige, pride, and authority for the monarch, or leadership and authority. Especially if the seal is made of metal, either silver or gold, and the seal can be mentioned at the beginning, especially if the ink and printer of the seal are clear on the papers. The best dream related to seeing a seal in a person’s dream is to see a seal with the word His Majesty (God) or a seal with the name The most valuable creation of our Master Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. On it, or the seal in the shape of an eagle, as all of these indicate his elevation and status as a prominent seer in the next period of his life. Interpretation of rings in a dream YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake bite by Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on a man and interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on a child

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite is considered one of the dreams and visions that afflict its owner with fear and panic, because the snake is a terrifying reptile that people do not like. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake bite? Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will be harmed, whether by friends or relatives And depending on the severity of the bite, the damage will be. A snake bite indicates crises and difficulties that await the dreamer and may also indicate the heavy loss that the dreamer will suffer and the fluctuation of his financial situation that may lead him to poverty. The vision can lead to enmity between the dreamer and someone in reality. A black snake bite in a dream is a sign of sadness and sorrow that surrounds the dreamer, and it could be a sign from God to the dreamer so that he stops committing sins and transgressions and returns to God. A snake bite on the dreamer’s head in a dream is a sign that he will suffer from excessive thinking as a result of many problems. In his life. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake bite by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that seeing a snake bite is sometimes good news for the dreamer, because it may indicate that he will get a lot of money if the bite is in the right hand. If the fortuneteller is able to kill the snake before To be bitten, this means that he will be able to confront his enemies who are chasing him. If one sees that a snake is biting him on the left hand, this is a sign of the bad deeds that he commits. In the case of the dreamer’s illness, his vision indicates that he will recover from his illness, and if he is a single young man, the vision It was an indication that he would get married soon. Dreaming of a black snake bite in a dream indicates serious harm to the person being caused to the fortuneteller and that there is a conspiracy against him. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream Snake bite: If the snake succeeds in biting an unmarried girl once, this indicates the failure of that girl in her life, whether practical or emotional, along with a feeling of fatigue and exhaustion. In the event that she is bitten by a snake twice, the vision is one of the desired visions that bodes well for the girl. This means that she will be saved from evil and some positive changes will occur in her life. Seeing a snake bite an unmarried woman could be a sign that this girl has a bad biography and a bad reputation among people because of her behavior and behavior, and she must realize what she is doing and become more balanced. Snake bite Being bitten by her feet without suffering means that she is walking on the forbidden path without any force or guidance from anyone, as she can commit adultery and many abominations. Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite for a married woman: If a married woman sees that there is a wild snake that has bitten her, then the dream indicates harm to this woman. If a woman is harmed by a stranger, the source of her harm may be a work friend or a neighbor. A wild snake bite indicates that a woman will be harmed by a person who lives far away from her, which indicates how much this person hates her and thinks a lot about different means to

title: Learn about the interpretation of a bag in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Bag in a dream: Seeing a bag is considered puzzling by many of them, and it is also a matter of disagreement among jurists. They went on to say that the interpretation of this vision is determined by what is in the bag of good or evil, and according to the value of these things and the extent of their benefit or harm to the viewer, and in this article we examine all of them. The indicators and special cases of the bag that we dream about in more detail and explanation, and we also explain the details that affect negatively or positively in the context of the dream. The bag in a dream: Seeing the bag expresses the things it contains. If a person looks at it and finds what makes him happy, then this is goodness and food that he accumulates, and benefits that he enjoys and fears in his heart, but if he finds in it what harms him and saddens him, then this is victory. Worries, excessive sorrows and fluctuations in life. The bag, from a psychological point of view, symbolizes the one who keeps secrets, keeps the covenant, and stores what will be useful to him when needed, and the one who carries the bag is preparing for a big matter and may complicate the intention of traveling. Or traveling to another place. And whoever sees that he is traveling without bags, this indicates that he has left the world, and the term is approaching, and whoever sees that he is putting the bag on his head, he has seen a secret and is hiding it with difficulty, and the harm from the bag is interpreted as leaking a secret and spreading it around the circles. The school bag indicates On receiving knowledge and acquiring knowledge, while official bags indicate public responsibilities and the assignment of great duties, and a heavy bag indicates heavy worries and burdens. The bag in a dream by Ibn Sirin. It should be noted that Ibn Sirin did not mention a special chapter to explain the vision of the bag or suitcase, but we can infer from some His interpretations of the navel and the loads that indicate the importance of the bag, where he stated that: The bag is interpreted according to what you carry in it, so if it is good, then it is good for the fortuneteller, and if it is bad, then it is harmful to him, and if it is heavy inside, then it is heavy. An annoying guest or neighbor, because it interprets burdens, worries, and sins. This vision also indicates pregnancy or imminent pregnancy, if the woman is able to do so, and if the bag is empty, this indicates a man who has no secrets or what he keeps from others, and one of his qualities is tolerance. Among his qualities is tolerance. He sees that he is carrying many bags, so he carries more than they can accommodate, and if the bag is lost, this indicates bad news and bitter adventures in life, and if his bag is stolen, he can also trust his secret in it. Whoever betrays him and betrays him. If a person finds a bag and returns it to its owner, this indicates that things will return to their normal course, and the vision indicates knowing the secret and informing its owner, and in the event that the bag is destroyed. This indicates the transfer of secrets from one person to another and the arrival of bad news. The bag in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi goes on to say that the bag indicates pregnancy, or what a person hides in his stomach, or what secrets he keeps that he does not reveal, or what is tied around his neck, and the bag is evidence of responsibilities and heavy burdens. Problems and difficulties of life and sudden changes. Whoever sees that she is carrying a bag, this indicates that she moves frequently from one place to another, and she may decide to travel in the near future, and if she is not married, she can move to another place.

This indicates the transfer of secrets from one person to another and the arrival of bad news. The bag in a dream according to Al-Osaimi. Al-Osaimi goes on to say that the bag indicates pregnancy, or what a person hides in his stomach, or what secrets he keeps that he does not reveal, or what is tied around his neck, and the bag is evidence of responsibilities and heavy burdens. Problems and difficulties of life and sudden changes. Whoever sees that she is carrying a bag, this indicates that she moves frequently from one place to another, and she may decide to travel in the near future, and if she is not married, she can move to another place.

title: Seeing dogs in a dream and being afraid of them

preview.html: This is according to the researcher Ibn Sirin, and through our topic today we will learn in detail from our website gptafser.com/ the interpretation of the vision clearly, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing dogs and being afraid of them in a dream for a single girl. Seeing fear of dogs in a virgin girl’s dream is considered a real matter. A warning to her to be careful of any A person trying to find out anything about her in order to benefit from her and harm her. Fear of black dogs in a dream. It indicates that he will enter into a failed love relationship. Because this person does not have good morals and often lies to her. In the event that the girl is engaged and she sees that she is very afraid of Dogs in her dream. A sign that she has no feelings of love towards her fiancé. And because she does not want to end this engagement, she must perform the Istikhara prayer so that God will show her goodness. When a girl sees that she is very afraid of dogs in a dream. It symbolizes that she is trying hard to achieve her dreams. And her goals and overcoming her circumstances. If a girl hits a dog in a dream because it is attacking her. The good news is that she will be able to get rid of someone who laughs at her in the name of love. Also, dreaming of a dog trying to bite her indicates that there is a person she will meet. But he will be a cheater if he By raising this dog in a dream. You must be more careful so as not to get hurt. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dog bite. Interpretation of seeing dogs and being afraid of them in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman sees dogs in a dream and is afraid of them. It symbolizes that she does not feel safe with her husband and that it is often He is lying to her. Seeing a dog inside the house and the woman frightening it. This indicates that she does not feel comfortable and calm in her home, but she is always tense, and God knows best. In the event that he saw a white dog. But she is afraid of it as a warning that a minor problem will happen to her. But he will use God to solve it and get rid of it. God willing. Fear of black dogs. A sign that they will fall into marital problems and may lead to separation. If a woman sees dogs attacking her children and is very afraid of them. A sign that he is always worried about them. If the married woman is chasing a lot of words, it says that she will fall In difficult problems in her life. But God will grant her death with the coming release. The woman is trying to escape from the dog in a dream because she feels afraid. It symbolizes that you will get rid of problems soon, in case you can escape from the dog. Seeing black dogs in a dream is considered a married woman. A sign that she is surrounded by many enemies and she must pray to God to keep them away from her. Interpretation of seeing dogs and being afraid of them in a dream for a man and its meaning. If a man dreams that he sees dogs chasing him. A sign that he is suffering from problems in his life. Running away from dogs in a dream indicates that he He will be able to face his problems and get rid of them, thanks to God. As for the case, if the dogs are black, it is a sign that a malicious person is trying to harm and harm him. A dog that bites a man in a dream is a sign that he will find himself in a financial crisis that is not easy. He must ask God Almighty for forgiveness until relief comes to him. Read also: Dogs barking in a dream, meaning of vision

title: What is the meaning of crying in Ibn Sirin’s dream about a neighborhood?

preview.html: Crying in a dream over someone about Crying in a dream over someone about is one of the dreams that we see in abundance, to the point that we sometimes wake up and find tears streaming down our cheeks, without knowing the interpretations that this dream carries, so today we decided to list for you the different meanings that the dream offers. According to the opinion of leading dream interpretation scholars, crying in a dream over someone is mostly indicative of sadness, but sometimes it is the result of overwhelming joy that the person could not bear, so tears flowed from him as a form of expression of this joy, and according to the details of the dream, scholars had different opinions about it. . And here are the details: If you know this living person well, meet him every day, follow his life and progress, and see that you are crying for him, only then can you understand whether crying is an expression of happiness for him or brings him sorrow and pity. What's happening to him.For the person who you know you haven't spoken to in a while and you find yourself crying in your sleep about him, you need to call him and get his news because they are often in big trouble and need your help. As one of the people closest to his heart. Scientists have said that seeing you as a specific person is evidence that you think about them a lot, whether it is a life partner or a loyal friend. If he is one of your friends and he has suffered a lot in his life due to his inability to achieve himself or reach the ambitions and goals that He planned it in his imagination, until despair began to creep into him. Certainly, he needs a lot of moral support from you as one of his most important friends, and you must do your duty towards him to maintain your friendship. If the reason for the crying is emotional separation between the dreamer and the partner, while in reality they are not related Emotionally, the opinion of scholars in the interpretation says that the dream indicates your farewell to one of the prominent figures in your life who has a great place in your heart because of his decision to travel outside the country and not return for many years. Interpretation of a dream about a living person crying by Ibn Sirin. The vision and interpretation of crying differs from one person to another according to the form of that crying, whether it is in tears or in an unnecessarily loud voice, and other details, each of which has different meanings that we learn below: If the dreamer is crying for a living person whom he knows closely, and his crying was Without a sound, and only tears flowing without feeling sad, he is one of the preachers who express this person’s arrival at a desire dear to his heart. Which he really despairs of achieving, but it will come true in the coming days, causing wonderful changes in his life. The dreamer can provide good news to this person about the interpretation of his vision. But if there is screaming and wailing in tears, then unfortunately it expresses a serious illness that afflicts its owner and he must He takes care of him and does not hesitate to see a specialist until he is almost healed. If he sees him crying among a large number of people without making a sound, then he will soon attend a happy occasion related to this person, and it may be his wedding or the wedding of one of his loved ones. If the person is unknown to the dreamer, the vision It expresses the events that happen to the dreamer himself. If he finds his tears flowing without pain or worry, then...

title: Interpretation of cooked rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Cooked rice in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions that causes a lot of confusion and controversy for the same dreamer. I would like to know the interpretation behind this vision, but it is known that the interpretation of dreams varies according to the dreamer’s social status as well as the situation. From the dream itself, and thus we will learn about all the interpretations of seeing rice in a dream for individuals and by referring to the opinions of the great interpreters of dreams. Cooked rice in a dream for a single woman. Seeing cooked rice in one dream is considered one of the good dreams that contain many good meanings that reflect positively on various aspects of life. The dreamer, whether social, educational, or professional. If an unmarried woman saw that she was cooking rice in a dream and suffered extreme fatigue and hardship, this means that the dreamer will be exposed to some obstacles in the coming period and some of the steps he had begun to take will be postponed. Free people cook Delicious white rice in large quantities and distributed to good-skinned friends and relatives so that the dreamer can get engaged to a religious person with whom she can live a quiet and stable life. Seeing an unmarried woman cooking rice and eating it greedily, she was already suffering from financial hardship. Cooked rice in a dream for the estate by the son Ibn Sirin interprets seeing cooked rice with a delicious smell in a woman’s dream as one of the visions that have many good interpretations and portends many positives in the coming days. Seeing an unmarried woman in the middle of a large market cooking huge quantities of yellow rice and feeling tired and in need of someone to help her is an indicator. On the viewer being exposed to her deteriorating health condition. Cooked rice in a dream for an unmarried woman by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that cooked rice in a person’s dream is only a sign of goodness and nourishment that the dreamer will acquire, and perhaps a sign of the beginning of a new period of life in which he will witness many happy things. But the matter is different if the dreamer is cooking dark red rice, then it is a sign that the dreamer is facing a big problem and needs someone to support her to get through this crisis. If an unmarried woman sees that she is selling cooked rice and was able to make a lot of money, this indicates that the dreamer He will enter a new experience or a profitable project, whether it is a marriage project or a business project. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet is a site specializing in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world, just write. The Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Cooked rice and meat in a dream for a single woman if An unmarried woman saw in her dream a plate of delicious cooked rice with pieces of meat next to it. This is one of the most promising dreams and shows the dreamer that he is rising to a new job or entering a new project from which he will reap. . Money in a way he had never expected before. While if an unmarried woman sees a plate of rice with pieces of raw meat next to it, it is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate that the dreamer is being carried away by desire.

This is one of the most promising dreams and shows the dreamer that he is rising to a new job or entering a new project from which he will reap. . Money in a way he had never expected before. While if an unmarried woman sees a plate of rice with pieces of raw meat next to it, it is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate that the dreamer is being carried away by desire.
